timeline.bodyText: next time pls consider introducing Estimation class instead of using BigDecimal. It's not clear, what's the UoM of estimation, hours, days, points etc?
timeline.author: teosarca

replies.bodyText: Right, there is an effort UOM on IssueEntity but i see your point.
replies.author: pvpurcarcosmin

timeline.bodyText:
I would rename Effort.of(long)  method to Effort.ofSeconds.
Reason:

much more descriptive
i have the feeling soon we will introduce ofHours(int) method too.
timeline.author: teosarca

timeline.bodyText:
do we have a test which, at least indirectly, uses LabelType enum?
reason: make sure those Patterns are compiled without exceptions.
timeline.author: teosarca

timeline.bodyText: pls document why we keep INVOICED status, but in other cases, we are using the status from ImportIssueInfo
timeline.author: teosarca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -249,6 +253,10 @@ private IssueEntity mergeIssueInfoWithEntity(@NonNull final ImportIssueInfo impo
 				? importIssueInfo.getMilestone().getMilestoneId()
 				: null;
 
+		final Status status = INVOICED.equals(existingEffortIssue.getStatus())

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/backend/de.metas.serviceprovider/src/main/java/de/metas/serviceprovider/issue/importer/IssueImporterService.java b/backend/de.metas.serviceprovider/src/main/java/de/metas/serviceprovider/issue/importer/IssueImporterService.java
index 460820b7f9..f13ed5e5dc 100644
--- a/backend/de.metas.serviceprovider/src/main/java/de/metas/serviceprovider/issue/importer/IssueImporterService.java
+++ b/backend/de.metas.serviceprovider/src/main/java/de/metas/serviceprovider/issue/importer/IssueImporterService.java

@@ -253,6 +253,7 @@ public class IssueImporterService
 				? importIssueInfo.getMilestone().getMilestoneId()
 				: null;
 
+		//INVOICED can be set only from mf, after the issue was invoiced, so it should be preserved
 		final Status status = INVOICED.equals(existingEffortIssue.getStatus())
 				? INVOICED
 				: importIssueInfo.getStatus();

timeline.author: teosarca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -216,6 +217,10 @@ private IssueEntity buildIssueEntity(@NonNull final I_S_Issue record)
 				.orElseThrow( () ->new AdempiereException("Unknown Status!").appendParametersToMessage()
 						.setParameter("I_S_Issue", record));
 
+		final LocalDate plannedUATDate = record.getPlannedUATDate() != null

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/backend/de.metas.serviceprovider/src/main/java/de/metas/serviceprovider/issue/IssueRepository.java b/backend/de.metas.serviceprovider/src/main/java/de/metas/serviceprovider/issue/IssueRepository.java
index 24ca27dfb9..2135bb9976 100644
--- a/backend/de.metas.serviceprovider/src/main/java/de/metas/serviceprovider/issue/IssueRepository.java
+++ b/backend/de.metas.serviceprovider/src/main/java/de/metas/serviceprovider/issue/IssueRepository.java

@@ -217,10 +216,6 @@ public class IssueRepository
 				.orElseThrow( () ->new AdempiereException("Unknown Status!").appendParametersToMessage()
 						.setParameter("I_S_Issue", record));
 
-		final LocalDate plannedUATDate = record.getPlannedUATDate() != null
-				? record.getPlannedUATDate().toLocalDateTime().toLocalDate()
-				: null;
-
 		return IssueEntity.builder()
 				.orgId(OrgId.ofRepoId(record.getAD_Org_ID()))
 				.externalProjectReferenceId(ExternalProjectReferenceId.ofRepoIdOrNull(record.getS_ExternalProjectReference_ID()))

timeline.author: teosarca

timeline.bodyText:
really loud thinking: somehow i feel like i would avoid the Null term because it's implementation detail (u internally decided to consider null roughEstimation as not already set).
Maybe setRoughEstimationIfNotSet  or setRoughEstimationIfNotAlreadySet would be much more descriptive.
timeline.author: teosarca
teosarca
